original_text: When Jesus said this, he was showing how Peter would die. His death would give honour to God. Then Jesus said to Peter, ‘Follow me.’
korean_text: 이 말씀을 하심은 베드로가 어떠한 죽음으로 하나님께 영광을 돌릴 것을 가리키심이러라 이 말씀을 하시고 베드로에게 이르시되 나를 따르라 하시니

sentences.original_text: he was showing how Peter would die
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 베드로가 어떻게 죽을지를 보여주고 있었다

sentences.original_text: His death would give honour to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 죽음은 하나님께 영광을 돌릴 것이다
